gw.bizrules.pcf

Class TextExpressionFragmentHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.bizrules.pcf.ExpressionFragmentHolder<ExpressionFragment,java.lang.String>
      • gw.bizrules.pcf.TextExpressionFragmentHolder

  • public class TextExpressionFragmentHolder
extends ExpressionFragmentHolder<ExpressionFragment,java.lang.String>
    A special holder which can parse and hold all different types of fragments, based on text. "template" is a special case of text
